branchCategory.name: EX250 Accessories
branchCategory.description: <p>EX250 is a serial interface unit controlling up to 32 solenoids.  This serial interface is compatible with series VQC1000/2000/4000 and SV1000/2000/3000 valves.  Available protocols include DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;</span>, CC-Link, AS-i, PROFIBUS-DP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>, and CANopen.  Input modules can be added or removed at the point of use.</p>

branchItem.name: Communication Cable for Ethernet Fieldbus
branchItem.description: <p>EX250 is a serial interface unit controlling up to 32 solenoids.  This serial interface is compatible with series VQC1000/2000/4000 and SV1000/2000/3000 valves.  Available protocols include DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;</span>, CC-Link, AS-i, PROFIBUS-DP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>, and CANopen.  Input modules can be added or removed at the point of use.</p>
